msbt.message: Hey, I've got a few minutes and some treasure, solet's do a treasure hunt! You interested?
Yeah! Let's do this!
I'm kinda busy... Not right now.
I've got a few minutes without anything on my calendar We should play a game or something! Whaddaya say? You in for a treasure hunt?
Sounds great! Ooh! Yeah!
I'm kinda busy... Not right now.
You up for something kind of weird and challenging? Then I have got a treasure hunt for YOU!
Yeah! Let's do this!
Sorry, not interested. Not right now.
Alright! I knew you'd be all about this.OK, I'm gonna need you to wait here for a bit while I make some preparations
, alright! I knew you were the right person for something goofy like this. OK, sojust chill out for a little bit while I creep around and look for a spot to bury this thing.
Groovy! Let's get to it.I'm gonna go scope out a place to hide this secret present.Maybe I shouldn't have told you that it was a secret present, but that ship has sailed.
Oh, waitit's the middle of the night! We can't do a treasure hunt in the dark. Maybe another time?
Ah, no worries. Maybe another time.
Hey, I'm not gonna twist your arm.You don't want to go digging around in the dirt for a random item. That's, like, your prerogative.
Hey, it was just an idea. No prob.

OK, let me tell you how this is gonna work. I buried some treasure somewhere on .<10_7 arg="240" />If you can find the treasure before time runs out, you win. It's, uh, not actually that complicated.<10_7 arg="240" /> Oh! And the thing that you win is the thing that you dug up. Like I said, not that complicated.<10_7 arg="300" />

OK, let me tell you how this is gonna work. I buried some treasure somewhere on .<10_7 arg="240" />If you can find the treasure before time runs out, you win. It's, uh, not actually that complicated.<10_7 arg="240" /> Oh! And the thing that you win is the thing that you dug up. Like I said, not that complicated.<10_7 arg="300" /> One last thing! This is supposed to be a battle of wits between you and me. That means no outside help.<10_7 arg="240" /> Now, are you ready?<10_7 arg="300" />

OK, let me tell you how this is gonna work. I buried some treasure somewhere on .<10_7 arg="240" />If you can find the treasure before time runs out, you win. It's, uh, not actually that complicated.<10_7 arg="240" /> I should tell you that I made it a little harder than usual this time, so good luck with that!<10_7 arg="300" />

OK, let me tell you how this is gonna work. I buried some treasure somewhere on .<10_7 arg="240" />If you can find the treasure before time runs out, you win. It's, uh, not actually that complicated.<10_7 arg="240" /> I should tell you that I made it a little harder than usual this time, so good luck with that!<10_7 arg="300" /> And it goes without saying that this is a battle of wits between you and me. That means no outside help.<10_7 arg="240" /> Now, are you ready?<10_7 arg="300" />
You've done this before, right? Do you want a little refresher on how it works?
Sure, just in case.
Nah, I'm good.
Alright, we got a pro treasure hunter here! Good luck!<10_7 arg="90" />
Alright, we got a pro treasure hunter here! So then you won't even be tempted to ask for help, right?<10_7 arg="90" /> Right. Good luck!<10_7 arg="90" />
You know that this is gonna be a little tougher than usual, right? Good luck!<10_7 arg="90" />

You know that this is gonna be a little tougher than usual, right?<10_7 arg="90" />Even so, getting help from your friends is still off-limits This is just between you and me!<10_7 arg="90" /> Good luck!<10_7 arg="90" />
Treasure hunt. Right now. You and me. What do you say? WHAT. DO. YOU. SAY?!
I SAY YES!
Uhh...no?

Ughhhthe ennui of everyday life is getting to me right now, . It's like, what am I doing here on ? What am I doing with my LIFE? I need to do something exciting.<10_4 /> Like a treasure hunt! We could do one right now! Are you in?!
Yeah, I'm in!
Er, sorry. Not now.
Whoa, how did the day get away from me like that?We can't start a treasure hunt at this hour. Maybe another time, OK?
Giddyup! I'm off to bury the treasure!
C'est la vie. I'm actually pretty busy right now anyway
Wait, what am I thinking? It's too late to get started with this now.I'm gonna have to offer you a rain check, .
That's my ! I knew you'd be down to do something weird like this. Alright, stay put while I go locate the perfect burial site for this treasure, OK?
Heh, that's alright. The real treasure was our friendship all along!
Something really weird is going on with the island, .There's literally no place to bury my treasure! I guess we'll have to think of something else to do.
